name: random_advice
description: Returns a random advice slip as a slip object.

name: advice_by_id
description: If an advice slip is found with the corresponding {slip_id}, a slip object is returned.

slip_id.description: The unique ID of this advice slip.

name: search_advice
description: If an advice slip is found, containing the corresponding search term in {query}, an array of slip objects is returned inside a search object.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
